author: Patrick Boyle
description:
🌟Go to http://covepure.com/patrick to get $200 off.

Is America Closing the Door on Global Talent?
Donald Trump’s new $100,000 fee on H-1B visa applications has sent shockwaves through the tech industry, universities, and foreign governments. In this video, we unpack the legal, economic, and political fallout — from panics at airports to diplomatic blowback, from the Hyundai factory raid to the eerie silence of Silicon Valley CEOs. Is this the end of skilled immigration as we know it? Or just another chapter in America’s long-running immigration drama?

We’ll explore:

What the H-1B visa is and why it matters
How the fee could reshape tech hiring, university admissions, and global talent flows
The legal challenges ahead and the industrial policy contradictions
Why CEOs are staying quiet — and what that silence says
The growing divide between MAGA populism and tech elite pragmatism

title: The End of Legal Immigration?
